name: cowrie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small sea creature with a soft body and a brightly coloured shell, or the shell itself used in the past as money in parts of Africa and southern Asia: a cowrie shell
Diane Macdonald/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
